titles.title: Expressing the approval of Congress for the 50th anniversary celebration of the homecoming of United States prisoners of war from Vietnam and in recognition of the extraordinary service and sacrifices of such prisoners of war during the Vietnam War.

Expressing the approval of Congress for the 50th anniversary celebration of the homecoming of United States prisoners of war from Vietnam and in recognition of the extraordinary service and sacrifices of such prisoners of war during the Vietnam War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses approval for the 50th anniversary celebration of the homecoming of U.S. prisoners of war from Vietnam and recognizes the service and sacrifices of such prisoners of war.
